This tab is dedicated to share some of the the data driven web decision support tools that I have developed. Some of these web I just my personal interest and curiosity to want to understand how changes of enviromental variables can help us grasp the glimpse of their changes. Others apps that I developed for institutions. You are free to ask and share them to your colleagues.
